phrases: It is common knowledge that contractors act rationally
regardless of what kind of situation they are in.
They are able to remain calm and collected while devising a sensible solution.
Are you awake, kitty cat?
Is it because they know no fear?
No, contractors can get scared shitless, just like anyone else.
The only difference is that they do not act on their emotions.
Even in a situation where they have been taken to the enemy's hideout...
Where do you think you are going, kitty cat?
I am a contractor and a cat, for one reason or another.
However, I can still make a rational assessment of my situation.
I am at the mercy of the enemy.
This is the best idea I can come up with.
Does it still hurt?
Thanks.
I am all right now.
Those lunatics from PANDORA are screwing around with us!
They should have known that nothing would come out of searching you, boss.
It is surprising that the Cabinet Office ordered the dispatch of PANDORA.
It is probably because it would have become a diplomatic issue if the Japanese police went too far.
What a damn shame.
You are right.
They did not have to yield investigation jurisdiction to PANDORA.
We are in Japan, for crying out loud.
External Affairs, Section Four.
Yes.
Boss!
The manager wants to see you.
It is Kirihara.
Come in.
I am sure you are already familiar with the agents.
Hi.
I believe we have not met.
This gentleman is in charge of MI6's operations in the Far East.
The name is Decade.
I am Kirihara.
I asked you to come here because of...
November 11.
What?
I will get straight to the point.
Do you know where he is?
With all due respect, I would like to ask you the same question.
In other words...
Was not he ordered to disappear from the scene?
I had assumed it was related to the abduction of Dr. Schroeder.
I have not heard a word from him in a week.
What do you mean?
That is what we would like to know.
Is he still MI6's best agent or has he become an instrument of the terrorists?
You look younger every time I see you, February.
Excuse me, I should have said Amber.
You have not changed at all, November 11.
I do not see the man from the other day.
Amagiri?
That is too bad.
Did you take a liking to him?
No, I do not have those kinds of interests.
That is good to know.
Since we are short on time, let us move on to the main topic.
Ask me whatever you would like.
Anything at all?
What is your favorite kind of food?
Apples.
What a coincidence.
Me, too.
You are lying.
That makes two of us.
Let us get back on topic.
Be my guest.
There is only one question I would like to ask.
What is the truth behind the syndicate you betrayed?
Hold on.
In order for you to get a better idea about the situation,
I have invited somebody else.
Please come in.
Dr. Schroeder...
Who are you?
One of them?
He might be, depending on what you have to say.
I told you, I am just a scientist employed by PANDORA.
What you people refer to as the syndicate...
Tell him the entire story, including that.
How many normals are in this room?
In other words, how many people here are not contractors?
Everybody here is a contractor.
My only ally is this cat, is not it?
He is a contractor, too.
Will you keep the promise we made earlier?
You will not kill me, no matter what I say?
You have my word.
My experimental hypothesis is very simple.
If I am correct, every contractor will disappear from this planet.
What?
Is that it?
Yes.
Is Mao still alive?
He was fine while the apparition was present.
What are Amber's objectives?
Last time she abducted Yin, and now she is taken Mao.
That is not all.
The good-looking guy from MI6 is involved, too.
Yin, what did Amber talk about the other day?
About you, Hei.
About your past and your future.
Hey, wait!
Do not tell me you are going there by yourself.
There is no guarantee you will make it back alive, even for somebody like you.
You will have to give up on Mao.
He would say the same thing if he was in my shoes.
Amber's after me.
I do not want to drag anyone else into this.
Are not you going to look for him?
Would you like one?
There is no point in worrying about him.
There is no way that man would leave a trail.
By the way, why are you cooperating with us?
Orders from above, or is it...
I just want to know the reason.
Reason?
Why did he say that to me?
From here on out, the line that separates enemies from allies does not exist.
You must act on your own intuition.
Dr. Schroeder already obtained the solution to the formula referenced in the plan.
The Third Sector's research team has reached the same conclusion as well.
In other words, we no longer need Dr. Schroeder.
We now have a replacement for the meteor fragment.
What a ridiculous plan!
Unfortunately, it is not very ridiculous at all,
although it failed in South America.
Were you responsible for the disappearance of Heaven's Gate?
Well, we were not the ones who made it disappear.
Technically speaking, it did not really disappear, either.
There was a strange emission of light moments before we proceeded with the plan,
and immediately after that happened, a 1,500 kilometer radius of Heaven's Gate in South America
became a physically unapproachable, neutral territory.
Lancernoptic reactions, beta-Garching waves from the area,
and the presence of a similar existence known as Hell's Gate
are grounds for the hypothesis that Heaven's Gate still exists to this day.
However, it is out of our hands.
Then again, the fact that the plan went awry during that time, despite the accuracy of my calculations,
means that something significant probably occurred.
Would not you agree?
Are you trying to recreate that occurrence in Tokyo as well?
If we do not, we will definitely disappear.
You make it sound as if you have seen the future.
Yes, I have.
I find that hard to believe.
I will prove it to you.
How would you do that?
You will die shortly after you leave this building.
Hey, what do you think?
How is he going to die?
We have literally received a death sentence, too.
That man's no different from us.
That would be a problem.
I am in the middle of an experiment.
If Amber's plan works, it will be a huge blessing for contractors.
Hey, do not you have any friends who will come to your rescue?
Contractors are rational beings.
They are not stupid enough to engage in a fight at the cost of their life.
I would not, anyway.
The Black Grim Reaper has made his way inside.
What should we do?
Nobody has to die here.
What about the professor?
The syndicate does not need him anymore.
Got it?
Episode Twenty-Two City Under Crackdown, Moist with Tears... (Part Two)
Sorry for making you go out of your way for our sake.
It is not a problem.
November... I found him.
Where is he?
What?
What?
Yin?
It could not be.
Hei!
Amber!
Let us settle our differences while we have an opportunity to do so.
You cannot do that.
Your job is to keep him busy.
Hei, behind you!
What are you trying to do?
What else are you going to take away from me?
Ask your feline friend about the details.
I told him everything.
T-This is...
Hei!
Onii-chan.
It looks like we are not meant to be the protagonists of this story, no matter how it unfolds.
I will leave the rest to you, kitty cat.
Freeze!
Lie on your stomach, and slowly place your hands on the floor.
Now!
Dr. Schroeder!
Dr. Schroeder, are you all right?
Dr. Schroeder!
I had a quick check done, and there are not any traces of the professor's memory being altered.
His vitals are normal.
I see.
What the hell happened?
I do not know.
Manager...
Good work.
Professor.
Now I know why South America became like that!
It was because of the masked contractor's powers!
Let us resume the testing right away!
If they beat us to it...
Professor,
the tests are already being conducted.
What are you doing?
Please escort the professor back to PANDORA.
We still have questions we need to ask the professor.
So do we.
Good day.
Manager!
I am afraid there is nothing we can do about it.
I see.
The professor told them everything.
As you said, it would be dangerous to defer the plan until the next solar maximum.
I know.
That man has been taken care of.
So long.
Where have you been all this time?
I was finishing my mission.
What is that?
A report on the so-called syndicate.
You were afraid that I would uncover your secrets, were not you?
I was more afraid of losing my best agent.
Of all people, I did not want you to find out.
Not until the very last moment of your kind's existence.
I am sorry it had to be this way.
Me, too.
Please record your message within fifteen seconds after the beep.
It is me.
I thought I would not bother you with a farewell message, but...
It looks like I have put you two in a life-threatening situation.
Let me emphasize that this is not a jo...
I guess I do not have to complete my remuneration since I am going to die.
Why?
Why did he do something like this?
Why?
You should not get involved any further.
That is why he sacrificed himself without telling you.
A rational decision, befitting of a contractor.
I appreciate your concern.
Thanks, Misaki.
I have finally gathered the necessary amount of dolls.
I see.
We cannot turn back the hands of time anymore.
Good-bye.
Why did you rescue me?
The most sensible course of action was to...
leave you to die.
It does not take the rational mindset of a contractor to understand something as simple as that.
You are a bunch of idiots.
He is the only idiot among us.
That aside, what was the urgent matter?
Oh, the GQ model from MI6 died.
Are you serious, Huang?
Yeah, he took his boss and their associates with him.
Knowing how the syndicate works,
it is only a matter of time before they find out Mao was there.
You need to tell me everything before they do.
What exactly happened over there?
That man...
He knew he was going to die.
It looks like there is a reason why I survived.
I heard it from Amber.
The syndicate's trying to erase every single contractor from the face of the Earth.
What?
Amber and her allies are establishing a resistance.
That is why they concealed the gate in South America five years ago.
Hold on.
What the hell are you talking about?
Wrong!
Her actions cannot be justified!
She is only... only...
She is not that kind of person.
What the hell is going on?
Two people, wandering the city with nowhere to go,
meet each other where the man died.
The two of them walk together.
They do not mention the doubts they have in their hearts,
and time simply passes, along with the faint twilight of feelings.
The countdown to the end had begun, before they even realized it.
Episode Twenty-Three God is In His Heaven...
And then, she says goodbye.
